short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Press the space bar (or up arrow key) to start the T-Rex game. To sit down - press down arrow key.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: T-Rex Dinosaur - a famous runner game. Press the space bar (or up arrow key) to start the T-Rex game. To sit down - press down arrow key.
